original_text: You are also to provide with it morning by morning a grain offering, consisting of a sixth of an ephah with a third of a hin of oil to moisten the flour. The presenting of this grain offering to the Lord is a lasting ordinance.
korean_text: 또 아침마다 그것과 함께 드릴 소제를 갖추되 곧 밀가루 육분의 일 에바와 기름 삼분의 일 힌을 섞을 것이니 이는 영원한 규례로 삼아 항상 나 여호와께 드릴 소제라

sentences.original_text: You are also to provide with it morning by morning
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 아침마다 그것을 바쳐야 하고

sentences.original_text: consisting of a sixth of an ephah
with a third of a hin of oil
The presenting of this grain offering
